entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is described as getting dressed inattentively and trying to put his hat on his foot instead of his sock.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's. She is eating breakfast with Ginny at the Gryffindor table in the Great Hall when Harry finds her.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a friend of Harry's and Hermione's. She is eating breakfast with Hermione at the Gryffindor table in the Great Hall when Harry finds them.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a character who has warned Harry about Karkaroff. He is mentioned as having said something to Harry, but his exact words are not specified.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is a character who has been warned about by Sirius. He is mentioned as being a problem that Harry and Hermione will worry about later.

relationships.description: Harry finds Hermione eating breakfast with Ginny at the Gryffindor table in the Great Hall and drags her out onto the grounds to talk about the dragons.
Harry talks to Hermione about something Sirius said, but it is not specified what exactly Sirius said.
Hermione is alarmed by Sirius's warnings about Karkaroff and thinks that the dragons are a more pressing problem.
